text: Pavel Landovský (September 11, 1936 – October 10, 2014) was a Czech actor, playwright and director. He was born in Německý Brod. He studied at the Faculty of Theatre in Prague. Landovský died in Prague, Czech Republic from a heart attack, aged 78. ==Some of his movies== Year Title Role Notes 2005 Kousek nebe 1989 Follow Me 1988 The Unbearable Lightness of Being 1971 The Tricky Game of Love 1969 End of a Priest Adelheid Já, truchlivý bůh ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Czech actors Category:Czech theatre directors
title: Pavel Landovský
